Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 7th overall pick, by Troy in 1984...
Had first career hit on 4/2/1985, off Walter Mccaw (CI)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/21/1985, off Christopher Headrick (PON)...
Had 5 hits with 4 RBI against West Texas on 8/23/1986...
Drove in 6 runs against Halifax on 6/7/1988...
Hit 3 homeruns against Pontiac, driving in 3 runs on 6/21/1988...
Was selected to the 1988 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/25/1989, hitting .500 with 0 HR, 7 RBI...
Won World Championship with Troy in 1989...
Drove in 6 runs against Boston (FBA) on 4/22/1990...
Signed as a free agent by Pontiac on 2/7/1991 to a 4-year deal worth $1,098,900 per year...
Traded from Pontiac to Capital City on 2/11/1991 (Going to CC: RF B. Ivery. Going to PON: C J. Solano, CF C. Rivera, P Q. Richard)...
Won Slick Fielder Award at Rightfield in 1991...
